title: Shadow of a doubt [DVD]
creator_credit: Alfred Hitchcock, Jack H. Skirball and Universal Pictures
brief_description: Film noir is here disconcertingly located in the calm world of small town America with young Charlie becoming attached by telepathic bond to her psychopathic uncle Charlie when he comes to visit her family in Santa Rosa. Cast includes Joseph Cotten, Teresa Wright and Macdonald Carey.
